TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Partitioner extends System.Object
public ref class Partitioner abstract sealed

summary.span: Proporciona estrategias comunes para la creación de particiones de matrices, listas y enumerables.

span.span: Provides common partitioning strategies for arrays, lists, and enumerables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Para más información, consulte [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md) (Particionadores personalizados para PLINQ y TPL).For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

span.span: How to: Speed Up Small Loop Bodies

Public Shared Function Create(Of TSource) (source As IEnumerable(Of TSource)) As OrderablePartitioner(Of TSource)
static member Create : seq<'Source> -> System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner<'Source>

typeparam.name: TSource
typeparam.span: Tipo de elementos del enumerable de origen.

span.span: Type of the elements in source enumerable.

param.name: source
param.span: Enumerable que se va a dividir en particiones.

span.span: The enumerable to be partitioned.

summary.span: Crea un particionador ordenable a partir de una instancia de .

span.span: Creates an orderable partitioner from a instance.

returns.span: Particionador ordenable basado en la matriz de entrada.

span.span: An orderable partitioner based on the input array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El orden utilizado en el particionador creado viene determinada por el orden natural de los elementos recuperados del origen enumerable.The ordering used in the created partitioner is determined by the natural order of the elements as retrieved from the source enumerable. Para obtener más información y ejemplos, vea [particionadores personalizados para PLINQ y TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).For more information and examples, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner`1<!!TSource> Create<TSource>(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!!TSource> source, valuetype System.Collections.Concurrent.EnumerablePartitionerOptions partitionerOptions) cil managed

static member Create : seq<'Source> * System.Collections.Concurrent.EnumerablePartitionerOptions -> System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner<'Source>

typeparam.name: TSource
typeparam.span: Tipo de elementos del enumerable de origen.

span.span: Type of the elements in source enumerable.

param.name: source
param.span: Enumerable que se va a dividir en particiones.

span.span: The enumerable to be partitioned.

param.name: partitionerOptions
param.span: Opciones para controlar el comportamiento de almacenamiento en búfer del particionador.

span.span: Options to control the buffering behavior of the partitioner.

summary.span: Crea un particionador ordenable a partir de una instancia de .

span.span: Creates an orderable partitioner from a instance.

returns.span: Particionador ordenable basado en la matriz de entrada.

span.span: An orderable partitioner based on the input array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El orden utilizado en el particionador creado viene determinada por el orden natural de los elementos recuperados del origen enumerable.The ordering used in the created partitioner is determined by the natural order of the elements as retrieved from the source enumerable.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner<TSource> Create<TSource> (System.Collections.Generic.IList<TSource> list, bool loadBalance);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner`1<!!TSource> Create<TSource>(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<!!TSource> list, bool loadBalance) cil managed
Public Shared Function Create(Of TSource) (list As IList(Of TSource), loadBalance As Boolean) As OrderablePartitioner(Of TSource)
static member Create : System.Collections.Generic.IList<'Source> * bool -> System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner<'Source>

typeparam.name: TSource
typeparam.span: Tipo de elementos de la lista de origen.

span.span: Type of the elements in source list.

param.name: list
param.span: Lista que se va a dividir en particiones.

span.span: The list to be partitioned.

param.name: loadBalance
param.span: Valor booleano que indica si el particionador creado debe equilibrar dinámicamente la carga entre las particiones en lugar de crear particiones estáticas.

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the created partitioner should dynamically load balance between partitions rather than statically partition.

summary.span: Crea un particionador ordenable a partir de una instancia de .

span.span: Creates an orderable partitioner from an instance.

returns.span: Particionador ordenable basado en la lista de entrada.

span.span: An orderable partitioner based on the input list.
